news.Content: Varejao reached an agreement with the Warriors on Sunday, according to Shams Charania of Yahoo! Sports.
Bogut (Achilles) is listed as questionable for Monday's game against the Hawks, Chris Vivlamore of the Atlanta Journal-Constitution reports.

Curry scored 36 points (14-22 FG, 3-3 FT, 5-11 3Pt) to go along with six rebounds, eight assists and three steals in 36 minutes during Monday's win over the Hawks.
Draymond Green;Green scored just six points (2-10 FG, 2-2 FT, 0-4 3Pt) to go along with 14 rebounds, nine assists, two steals and a block in 38 minutes Sunday against the Hawks.
Thompson scored 27 points (10-23 FG, 3-3 FT, 5-14 3Pt) to go along with three assists, three steals and two rebounds in 37 minutes of Monday's win over the Hawks.
